abstract: Basic issues with a De Niro / Stiller flick and judicial activity.
snippet: Basic issues with a De Niro / Stiller flick and judicial activity.
lead_paragraph: Andrea Carla Michaels co-constructed the very first puzzle I talked about here at Wordplay and she’s back again, this time with a solo work. I’ve never had a chance to meet her but I hear she’s a wild and crazy gal, by which I mean a former stand-up comic among other things. She writes for magazines (Games, TV Guide) and has written for TV (Designing Women) . She once won a motor home on Wheel of Fortune, and she now runs a business called Acme Naming where she uses her word skills to sell names. She’s a Scrabble fanatic, and now and then she guest-blogs for Rex Parker.
